abstract: JPMorgan Chase has reorganized the management of its capital markets operations, naming separate global leadership teams to oversee both equity and debt capital markets, the firm announced in an internal memorandum.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has reorganized the management of its capital markets operations, naming separate global leadership teams to oversee both equity and debt capital markets, the firm announced in an internal memorandum.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has reorganized the management of its capital markets operations, naming separate global leadership teams to oversee both equity and debt capital markets, the firm announced in an internal memorandum reviewed by DealBook on Tuesday.

headline.main: JPMorgan Shuffles Its Capital Markets Leadership

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: The judge ruled that the trustee, Irving H. Picard, did not have the legal right to pursue $20 billion in combined damage claims against JPMorgan Chase & Company and UBS.
snippet: The judge ruled that the trustee, Irving H. Picard, did not have the legal right to pursue $20 billion in combined damage claims against JPMorgan Chase & Company and UBS.
lead_paragraph: For the second time this year, a federal judge has barred a court-appointed bankruptcy trustee from seeking billions in damages from big banks and other third parties to help compensate victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s giant Ponzi scheme.

headline.main: U.S. Judge Bars a Suit for Victims of Madoff
headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Bars a Suit For Victims Of Madoff
